message: Accept and we can split the remaining 1,000,000$ into 600,000$ for me and 400,000$ for you. It's a fair deal!
You can have 300,000, but I think I deserve more. Let's see what you say!
That's a pretty low offer. I think I deserve more than 300,000. I'll make a counteroffer in the next round.
I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 420,000 and leave you with 580,000. It's a fair split, considering the decreasing value of money.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I think 550,000 is the minimum I'm willing to accept. Your turn to decide!
550,000 is still a bit too low for me. I think I can do better than that. I'll wait for your next offer.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'll take 480,000 and leave you with 520,000. It's a fair split, considering the current value of the money.
